title: The Nightshade's Apprentice
description: THIS M/M DARK FANTASY ROMANCE contains mature content. Ages 17+ Go to the official URL for book extras such as a fantasy map and additional illustrations.My name’s Kian, and I’m the Assassin of the Silver Rose. I’m the first disciple of the god of thieves. Even though you can see my true age in my eyes, my body looks nineteen. As long as I continue to kill I’ll have eternal youth. That’s how Tethyr rewards my loyalty. It’s only the first of my blessings.Impressed? Don’t be. When I started out I belonged to the Nightshade, a cruel man with overreaching ambition.I was his apprentice. He taught me how to murder, and blood’s been my trade ever since. I’d say we’re the same, but I’d be lying. I found love. And that’s made all the difference.The Nightshade’s Apprentice is part one of two but can stand alone.
author: Michael Offutt
